about_the_game:
2, 4, 6, 8
Who do we appreciate?
Say it Loud!
Say it proud!
Goooo Awesomenauts!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Penny Fox in Awesomenauts. You need to have Penny Fox available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
detailed_description:
2, 4, 6, 8
Who do we appreciate?
Say it Loud!
Say it proud!
Goooo Awesomenauts!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Penny Fox in Awesomenauts. You need to have Penny Fox available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

name: Awesomenauts - Cheerleader Penny Skin

short_description: 2, 4, 6, 8 Who do we appreciate? Say it Loud! Say it proud! Goooo Awesomenauts! This DLC contains a custom skin for Penny Fox in Awesomenauts. You need to have Penny Fox available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
